name: Star Island HD
description:
A very funny touch game that make chains of the same starfish and with various instruments.

4 Game Modes:
☆ Challenge Mode: Climb the level one by one, harder and harder and try to make the highest score.
☆ Time Limit Mode: You have 60 seconds only to make the best score.
☆ Longest Mode: Try to make the longest chain in game.
☆ Clean Mode: Try to remove all the starfish
